sentences: Krishna Gundopant Ginde, better known as K.G. Ginde (26 December 1925 â€“ 13 July 1994) was an Indian classical singer and teacher.
Ginde, called "Chhotu" (small) by family members and close friends because he was the 8th among 9 children, was born on December 26, 1925, in Bailhongal, near Belgaum.
When he was just 11 years old, he moved to Lucknow and started his music training under music scholar S N Ratanjankar.
